brakingForce.description: The braking force in Newtons (kg⋅m/s²) that the wheel can provide. If negative or not specified, use propulsion force for braking.

maxPropulsionForce.description: The maximum force in Newtons (kg⋅m/s²) that the wheel can provide.

maxSteeringAngle.description: The maximum angle in radians that the wheel can steer.

physicsMaterial.description: The index of the physics material in the top level physicsMaterials array.

propulsionForceChangeRate.description: The rate at which the wheel can change its applied force, measured in Newtons per second (N/s) or kilograms meters per second cubed (kg⋅m/s³) in SI base units. If negative or not specified, the wheel instantly changes to the desired propulsion force.

radius.description: The radius of the wheel in meters. This is the radius of a circle in the local YZ plane.

steeringChangeRate.description: The rate at which the wheel can change its steering angle, measured in radians per second (rad/s). If negative, the wheel instantly changes to the desired steering angle.

suspensionDampingCompression.description: The damping of the suspension during compression, the resistance to the velocity of the suspension. It is measured in Newton-seconds per meter (N⋅s/m), or kilograms per second (kg/s) in SI base units.

suspensionDampingRebound.description: The damping of the suspension during rebound/relaxation, the resistance to the velocity of the suspension. It is measured in Newton-seconds per meter (N⋅s/m), or kilograms per second (kg/s) in SI base units.

suspensionStiffness.description: The stiffness of the suspension, the resistance to traveling away from the start point. It is measured in Newtons per meter (N/m), or kilograms per second squared (kg/s²) in SI base units.

suspensionTravel.description: The maximum distance the suspension can move up or down in meters.

targetPropulsionForceRatio.description: The ratio of the maximum force the wheel is using for propulsion. May be negative for reverse force. Values outside the range [-1.0, 1.0] have implementation-defined behavior.

targetSteeringRatio.description: The ratio of the maximum steering angle the wheel is rotated to. May be negative for steering in the opposite direction.

width.description: The width of the wheel in meters. This is the width of the wheel in the local X axis.
